summary: The implementation successfully delivers all 11 requirements with comprehensive wound analysis functionality. All seven wound metrics are implemented with client-side image analysis, a complete dashboard with clinical interpretations, historical tracking with comparison capabilities, and a professional medical interface using green and white color schemes. Color composition analysis is prominently displayed as specified. No external AI APIs are used, and all constraints are respected.

hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest contains no authentication requirements, yet the implementation includes full Internet Identity integration with login/logout functionality, AuthClient configuration, and identity management across multiple files

hallucinated_features.description: Three-tab navigation system with Guide tab
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not specify a tabbed interface or a guide/help section. The implementation adds a three-tab system (Analyze, History, Guide) with an Understanding Wound Assessment guide page
No requirement mentions delete confirmation dialogs or alert dialogs for any destructive actions
BuildRequest does not specify toast notifications or any particular feedback mechanism for save operations beyond standard display
